title: 请问沉浸工程的“矿床”能添加其他模组的矿物吗？
author: piyeyu

replies.author: chl11222
replies.txt_content: 看了一下，通用机械并不与沉浸工程联动，可能是不行的。

replies.author: piyeyu
replies.txt_content:
youyihj 发表于 2020-7-14 11:03

看不懂呀  能帮忙加进去吗？。。。辛苦大佬

replies.author: youyihj
replies.txt_content:
需要CraftTweaker

所需的zs脚本
mods.immersiveengineering.Excavator.addMineral("Osmism Ore", 50, 0.005, ["oreOsmism"], [0.005], [1, -1], true);复制代码

replies.author: piyeyu
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 piyeyu 于 2020-7-14 20:43 编辑 
mods.immersiveengineering.Excavator.addMineral("oreOsmium", 50, 0.005, ["oreOsmium"], [0.005]);复制代码
